title: TravelerGenome
description: A set of parameters that defines the exploration strategy of a Traveler agent.

query_diversity.description: Controls the randomness of query generation. Maps to temperature/top-p.

query_template_id.description: ID of the prompt template used for query generation.

language_mix.description: Ratio of English queries to generate. 0.0 for Japanese only, 1.0 for English only.

source_bias.description: Bias towards certain types of information sources.

search_depth.description: How many steps the agent takes. 1 for initial search, 2 for follow-up search based on results.

novelty_weight.description: Internal weight for how much to prioritize novelty during result ranking (e.g., in MMR).
